languages.text: "Если позволите, Ваша Светлость, спецотряд с приказом о подавлении — это инструмент игнорирования проблемы, а не решения".
"If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."
languages.original_text: "Если позволите, Ваша Светлость, спецотряд с приказом о подавлении — это инструмент игнорирования проблемы, а не решения".

traits.locale_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “如果我可以发言的话，大人，派遣突击队粉碎叛乱更像是掩盖问题的手段，并不是解决问题的方式。”
languages.original_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."

traits.locale_text: “如果我可以发言的话，大人，派遣突击队粉碎叛乱更像是掩盖问题的手段，并不是解决问题的方式。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «Con el debido respeto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, enviar un escuadrón a aplastar la rebelión es una forma de ignorar el problema, no de resolverlo».
languages.original_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."

traits.locale_text: «Con el debido respeto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, enviar un escuadrón a aplastar la rebelión es una forma de ignorar el problema, no de resolverlo».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「お言葉ですが陛下、反乱を鎮圧するために部隊を派遣することは、問題を解決するのではなく、問題を無視する手段です」
languages.original_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."

traits.locale_text: 「お言葉ですが陛下、反乱を鎮圧するために部隊を派遣することは、問題を解決するのではなく、問題を無視する手段です」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Wenn ich das sagen darf, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}: Ein Killerkommando zu schicken, um eine Rebellion niederzuschlagen, damit ignoriert man das Problem, statt es zu lösen."
languages.original_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich das sagen darf, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}: Ein Killerkommando zu schicken, um eine Rebellion niederzuschlagen, damit ignoriert man das Problem, statt es zu lösen."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Sauf votre respect, Votre Seigneurie, envoyer un escadron pour mater la rébellion dans le sang revient à ignorer la crise qui nous guette, et non pas à la résoudre. »
languages.original_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."

traits.locale_text: « Sauf votre respect, Votre Seigneurie, envoyer un escadron pour mater la rébellion dans le sang revient à ignorer la crise qui nous guette, et non pas à la résoudre. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaade ederseniz... İsyanı bastırmak için manga göndererek meseleyi çözemez, aksine göz ardı etmiş oluruz."
languages.original_text: "If I may, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, sending a hit squad to crush the rebellion is a means of ignoring the problem, not solving it."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaade ederseniz... İsyanı bastırmak için bir manga göndererek meseleyi ancak göz ardı ederiz, çözemeyiz."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
